scripts.allure:open: npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:report
scripts.test:all: npm run clean:reports && npx bddgen && npx playwright test && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:critical: npx bddgen && npm run clean:reports && npx playwright test --grep /@critical/ && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:smoke: npx bddgen && npm run clean:reports && npx playwright test --grep /@smoke/ && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:regression: npx bddgen && npm run clean:reports && npx playwright test --grep /@regression/ && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:cadastro: npx bddgen && npm run clean:reports && npx playwright test --grep /@cadastro/ && npm run allure:open
